member.name: T:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBLicenseInfo
member.summary: Used to hold the license type and statuses returned by TBApp.KeyCheck() and TBApp.KeyChanged()

member.name: T:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBPrivacyMode
member.summary: Use this to set the privacy mode for Trackerbird

member.name: F:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBPrivacyMode.Off
member.summary: Collects both architecture and usage data (default).

member.name: F:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBPrivacyMode.Low
member.summary: Collect only architecture data but NOT usage data.

member.name: F:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBPrivacyMode.High
member.summary: Does not collect any architecture or usage data.

member.name: T:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBPrivacyModeReturn
member.summary: This is returned by GetPrivacyMode()

member.name: F:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBPrivacyModeReturn.Off
member.summary: Collects both architecture and usage data (default).

member.name: F:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBPrivacyModeReturn.Low
member.summary: Collect only architecture data but NOT usage data.

member.name: F:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBPrivacyModeReturn.High
member.summary: Does not collect any architecture or usage data.

member.name: T:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBConfig
member.summary: Use this class to set values related to the tracked application and configure the Trackerbird SDK

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBConfig.CreateConfig(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Must be called to initalize the Trackerbird configuration data.

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBConfig.SetFilePath(System.String)
member.summary: Can be called before CreateConfig in order to set the location where the Trackerbird data files should be stored.

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBConfig.SetProductEdition(System.String)
member.summary: Used to set the edition of the application being tracked.

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBConfig.SetProductLanguage(System.String)
member.summary: Used to set the language of the application being tracked.

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBConfig.SetProductVersion(System.String)
member.summary: Used to set the version of the application being tracked.

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBConfig.SetProductBuildNumber(System.String)
member.summary: Used to set the build number of the application being tracked.

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBConfig.SetPrivacyMode(Trackerbird.Tracker.TBPrivacyMode)
member.summary: Use this to set the privacy mode.
member.param: Sets what data Trackerbird will collect from your end users.

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBConfig.GetPrivacyMode
member.summary: Use this method to retrieve the current privacy mode being used by Trackerbird

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBConfig.SetCustomProperty(System.Int16,System.String)
member.summary: Sets a custom property related to the application bein tracked.
member.param: The index of the value to be stored
A String value which should be stored at the specified location

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBConfig.SetDefaultProxyCredentials(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Set the proxy username and password that will be used by the SDK to authenticate with the default Windows proxy server defined in IE settings.

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBConfig.SetProxy(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the proxy to be used by the Trackerbird SDK to contact the Trackerbird servers.

member.name: T:Trackerbird.Tracker.StartStatusEnum
member.summary: Represents the status of the Trackerbird SDK

member.name: T:Trackerbird.Tracker.GenericReturn
member.summary: Represents common return values that may be returned by various methods

member.name: T:Trackerbird.Tracker.MessageType
member.summary: Represents the types of messages which can be retrieved

member.name: T:Trackerbird.Tracker.KeyType
member.summary: Represents the type of the license key currently being used

member.name: T:Trackerbird.Tracker.ConnectionReturn
member.summary: Returned by TBApp.ConnectionCheck() to represent the status of the connection to the Trackerbird server

member.name: T:Trackerbird.Tracker.VersionCheckReturn
member.summary: Represents the status of the version of the application using Trackerbird

member.name: T:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBApp
member.summary: Use this class to track your applications

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBApp.Start
member.summary: This signals that your application has started. This should be placed before calling any other Trackerbird method (Except SetProxy when using a proxy).

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBApp.Sync
member.summary: Attempts to sync all of the logs and information gathered from the machine to the server.

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBApp.Stop(System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method should be called when your application is exiting. It will signal Trackerbird to log the event and to attempt to Sync with the Servers. After calling this Method, TBApp.Start must be called again to start using Trackerbird.
member.param: Set this parameter to false only in important scencarios where the SDK should exit instantaneously such as installations. For more information please refer to the documentation or contact Trackerbird Support.

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBApp.Stop(System.Int32)
member.param: Set this parameter to the desired sync timeout.

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBApp.StartStatus
member.summary: Returns the status of the Trackerbird SDK.

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBApp._SessionStartX86(System.String)
member.summary: Start a user session (multi-session mode only)
member.param: A unique session ID to identify the user session

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBApp.SessionStart(System.String)
member.summary: Start a user session (multi-session mode only)
member.param: A unique session ID to identify the user session

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBApp.SessionStop(System.String)
member.summary: End a user session (multi-session mode only)
member.param: A unique session ID to identify the user session

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBApp.StartAutoSync
member.summary: This signals the start of autosynchronization with the server. After calling this method a sync will be done automatically every fixed period of time Call on TBApp.StopAutoSync() to stop the automatic synchronization.

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBApp.StopAutoSync
member.summary: Used to stop the auto synchronization which can be started by calling on TBApp.StartAutoSync().

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBApp.ExceptionTrack(System.String,System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Tracks and logs exceptions from within your code.
member.param: The class name from which the error originated. If the length of the string is greater than 50 it will be truncated.
The method name from which the error originated. If the length of the string is greater than 50 it will be truncated.
The handled exception

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBApp.ConnectionCheck(System.String)
member.summary: Check if the SDK is able to connect to the internet in order to connect with Trackerbird Servers

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBApp.VersionCheck(System.String@,System.String@,System.String@,System.String@)
member.summary: Checks if there is a newer version of your application available.
member.param: The internal version number used by the application, set when a new version is available
The newer version which can be used to be displayed to users.
member.returns: Returns VersionCheckReturn which will represent the status of the version

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBApp.KeyChanged(System.String)
member.summary: Checks the status of a new key being given to your application.
member.param: The new key attempting to be entered.
member.returns: Returns an instance of a TBLicenseInfo object which contains all of the key information

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBApp.KeyCheck(System.String)
member.summary: Checks the status of the key being used by your application with the server.
member.param: The key being used
member.returns: Returns an instance of a TBLicenseInfo object which contains all of the key information.

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBApp.SetLicense(System.Nullable{Trackerbird.Tracker.KeyType},System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Used to set the license type and status flags in order to be logged and be made available on the Trackerbird reporting system. Any parameter may be set to null if that particular value is not used or should be left unchanged.

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBApp.MessageCheck(System.String@,Trackerbird.Tracker.MessageType@)
member.summary: Checks with the Trackerbird Sever if there are any messages available to be recieved by your application. This overload retrieves all message types and should be handled accordingly.
member.param: Will be populated with the message retrieved from the server.
The type of the message which has been retrieved.
member.returns: Returns an integer representing the number of messages which are available on the server.

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBApp.MessageCheck(System.String@,Trackerbird.Tracker.MessageType)
member.summary: Checks with the Trackerbird Sever if there are any messages available to be recieved by your application. This overload will retrieve only specified message types..
member.param: Will be populated with the message retrieved from the server.
Set which message type should be retrieved by the server.
member.returns: Returns an integer representing the number of messages which are available on the server.

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBApp.EventTrack(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Track events/features being used from within your application
member.param: Optional (nullable) String by which to categorize your event. If the length of this string and the 'eventName' parameter is greater than 50 it will be truncated.
The name used to describe the event. This string cannot be longer than 40 characters. Also, if the length of this string and the 'category' parameter is greater than 50 it will be truncated.
The user session ID. Used only in multi-session mode. Must be set to null in single-session mode.

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBApp.EventTrackNum(System.String,System.String,System.Double,System.String)
member.summary: Track events being along with a numeric custom value.
member.param: Optional (nullable) String by which to categorize your event. If the length of this string and the 'eventName' parameter is greater than 50 it will be truncated.
The name used to describe the event. This string cannot be longer than 40 characters. Also, if the length of this string and the 'category' parameter is greater than 50 it will be truncated.
A numeric (double) value which is related to your event and you would like to store
The user session ID. Used only in multi-session mode. Must be set to null in single-session mode.

member.name: M:Trackerbird.Tracker.TBApp.EventTrackTxt(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Track events being along with a String custom value.
member.param: Optional (nullable) String by which to categorize your event. If the length of this string and the 'eventName' parameter is greater than 50 it will be truncated.
The name used to describe the event. This string cannot be longer than 40 characters. Also, if the length of this string and the 'category' parameter is greater than 50 it will be truncated.
A String value which is related to your event and you would like to store
The user session ID. Used only in multi-session mode. Must be set to null in single-session mode.
